title: Agbe
author: Agbe
created_time: January 05, 2023, 06:50:37 AMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 08:26:56 AM by Agbe
content: New Year Gift From theymos to IgebotzCongratulations to Igebotz formally known as igehhh.Â I saw the name igehhh yesterday night from the  [CHARTS] Monthly Overview Of The official Nigeria Local BoardðŸ“ˆ New Poll and I was trying to locate the name to see the monthly up this morning. But surprisely I couldn't see the name again so I have to check Nigeria board to see if the thread has been moved to the local board but I didn't see it as well. There I checked a comment that made Igehhh to see if the user was removed from the forum but to my surprise the name has been changed to Igebotz. Igebotz congratulations to new name. theymos thank you for responding to request faster these days.Pakistan local board is also needed, their contributions to the forum and bitcoin is great.

comments.author: DaNNy001
comments.body: Wow! Â This is great and interesting news and this shows that the T-man is really working and hopefully he will also grant all the request of members that are core contributor to the growth of the forum.Â Â Just recently we have seen major activeness from theymos in the forum, Changing of pharmacist to sceptical chemist,Granting Nigerians their own formal local board, Â And now he started giving users their New Year presents@igehhg to igebotz. Â  Igebotz was a key figure in making sure Nigerians got their local and has contributed vastly in the development of the forum so i think he deserves the new year present. Congratulations to igebotz and others soon to receive their own gifts from theymos.Thanks you sir for your active present and responses to the forum and hopefully a new year present will also be granted to the Pakistan forum members for their tireless activeness in the forum.

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Honestly I don't understand why change of name need to be congratulated except from the user who change the name. I mean what's the reason for them to change name? of course to make people don't know what's their old username, maybe the username has something personal or could make him in trouble. Another thing, why this thread is posted in Meta? you need to move it to Reputation section.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on January 05, 2023, 07:11:32 AMAnother thing, why this thread is posted in Meta?I appreciate the heads up, without it, my Trust list viewer update would fail. Theymos' data dump contains usernames instead of userIDs, and I can't really search them that way.

comments.author: joker_josue
comments.body: Quote from: Agbe on January 05, 2023, 06:50:37 AMNew Year Gift From theymos to IgebotzCongratulations to Igebotz formally known as igehhh.Congratulations to him, and to everyone who has achieved these changes.We'll probably have more, and we haven't found out yet... We have to start hunting for changes. Well, I can do this information quickly... I'll think about it.

comments.author: Zanab247
comments.body: Congratulations Igebotz for your new achievement and, I wish you more wisdom and strength to continue the good work. you really deserved this title because you have contributed so many positive things in this forum and other local board forum, once again congratulation Â Igebotz.

comments.author: digaran
comments.created_time: January 05, 2023, 08:44:44 AMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 10:39:19 AM by digaran
comments.body: If you consider this as a new year gift then you are dead wrong, *SIR theymos is more generous than what you might imagine.Could you Â let us know the significance of the new name?*=This dude is really on a different level, changing names to show his appreciation to those who help the forum operate unofficially. That's just cheap man. lol.New addition, there they explain the reason for this name change:Â  https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5433100.0

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on January 05, 2023, 07:11:32 AMHonestly I don't understand why change of name need to be congratulated except from the user who change the name. I mean what's the reason for them to change name? of course to make people don't know what's their old username, maybe the username has something personal or could make him in trouble. You could say that actually but we dont know the reason why the user request to change name. Also there are only few given the rights by theymos to change their names and also depends on their reason. If this was easy then a lot has been granted that already.

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: cryptoaddictchie on January 05, 2023, 10:33:03 AMYou could say that actually but we dont know the reason why the user request to change name.Click.

comments.author: nakamura12
comments.body: Well, this is not the first time it happen where a user requested to change the username for private reason. Everyone can request to theymos to change their usernames even me can request but the challenge as I say about it is that, will the admin granted your request?. What cryptoaddictchie said is true and during my time in Bitcointalk forum is I never heard or know that many people requested or ask to change their name. As I have posted before in other thread that I think only the name is changed and the username is the same. Correct me guys if I am wrong about it. Why I think that way is because when you go to settings is you can see username and name.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Quote from: Solosanz on January 05, 2023, 07:11:32 AMHonestly I don't understand why change of name need to be congratulated Some name changes where the user requested based on sentimental reasons and which lingers before it is approved could call for some sort of congratulations.Quote from: LoyceV on January 05, 2023, 07:55:15 AMTheymos' data dump contains usernames instead of userIDs, and I can't really search them that way.How effective would a list of all name changes be? Of course, not those where privacy would be a concern and the user would not want their previous display name linked to their new one.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: Actually this doesn't required to be congratulated of, since it was just for his brand purpose and i so much like the change maybe anyone dealing with him will have to be very mindful and should check out his details correctly otherwise scammer would still use old username to scam people.@Igebotz you made a very smart move

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: A user has his personal reason why its user name should be change by Theymos,and I will say it is good to congratulate the person whose request has been granted by Theymos,this means you are recognized by you effort and contributions in your participation in the forum.To change your name is not an easy thing to be done in the forum because you have to pass through the admin and your request can be ignored which shows that your name might not be changed.Igebotz this is an achievement to you in the forum as it was a request you made that has been granted by Theymos

comments.author: armanda90
comments.body: What does important thing about changed name? actually when registering account at the first time have opportunity to create username based on our needed. But after long term process and suddenly change the username and I don't think have priority and make special thing when user name have been changed.I worry later will having many board or topic request for their name change due after looking several user success change their username, I can't imagine next time when looking many board or topic request for changing their username.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: armanda90 on January 05, 2023, 02:36:50 PMWhat does important thing about changed name? actually when registering account at the first time have opportunity to create username based on our needed. But after long term process and suddenly change the username and I don't think have priority and make special thing when user name have been changed.Differenr reason for everyone that has been granted to change name. Most are personal reasons, and I think its hard to discern or disclosed those of. We can say that theymos only granted those who have valid reason and explanation. Also some who are contributed big here in forum maybe.

comments.author: Igebotz
comments.body: Quote from: nakamura12 on January 05, 2023, 11:38:18 AMAs I have posted before in other thread that I think only the name is changed and the username is the same. Correct me guys if I am wrong about it. Why I think that way is because when you go to settings is you can see username and name.Quote from: Adbitco on January 05, 2023, 12:41:42 PMActually this doesn't required to be congratulated of, since it was just for his brand purpose and i so much like the change maybe anyone dealing with him will have to be very mindful and should check out his details correctly otherwise scammer would still use old username to scam people.@Igebotz you made a very smart move nakamura12 You are correct, and just to clarify, I still own the naming rights to the username "igehhh," and it will never be used by another user; Igebotz is merely a placeholder name, whereas Igehhh remains my surname. Don't worry, both are under my ownership. These are the few advantages that established members enjoythank you, OP Although I was not expecting a congratulations message, I would appreciate it if this was locked as soon as possible so that we could move on.
